resources.string: This free online personality test, along with our eBooks and articles, can help you determine your four-letter personality type (e.g., INFJ, INFP, INTJ, INTP). For each of the 36 items below, select the letter associated with the word or phrase that best captures your historical personality preferences.\nTry not to overthink your responses. If you are unsure of how to respond, you can leave the item unmarked.
